            List.Vector.ofFn fun layer => (Cache.cons α n leaves a ↑↑layer).get ↑↑(findNeighbors i layer))) <$>
        buildMerkleTree α n newLeaves).finSupport
⊢ (if ↑i % 2 = 0 then do
      let newLeaf ← liftM (query () (a, path.get ⟨n, ⋯⟩))
      verifyProof α (↑↑i / 2) newLeaf b (List.Vector.drop 1 path)
    else do
      let newLeaf ← liftM (query () (path.get ⟨n, ⋯⟩, a))
      verifyProof α (↑↑i / 2) newLeaf b (List.Vector.drop 1 path)) =
    pure ()

goal.type:
n : ℕ
pSpec : ProtocolSpec n
ι : Type
inst✝² : DecidableEq ι
oSpec : OracleSpec ι
StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' : Type
inst✝¹ : (i : pSpec.ChallengeIndex) → VCVCompatible (pSpec.Challenge i)
inst✝ : oSpec.FiniteRange
data : TransportData StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut'
stmtIn : StmtIn
witIn : WitIn
P : Prover pSpec oSpec StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut'
⊢ (fun a =>
        (data.fStmtOut (a.2.2.1, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2.1).1), data.fWitOut (a.2.2.2, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2.1).2),
          a.1)) <$>
      Fin.induction (pure (default, P.input (data.fStmtIn stmtIn) (data.fWitIn witIn), stmtIn, witIn))
        (fun j ih => do
          let __discr ← ih
          match hDir : (pSpec j).1 with
            | Direction.V_to_P =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a __discr.1, P.receiveChallenge ⟨j, hDir⟩ __discr.2.1 a, __discr.2.2)) <$>
                liftM (query (Sum.inr ⟨j, hDir⟩) ())
            | Direction.P_to_V =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a.1 __discr.1, a.2, __discr.2.2)) <$>
                (P.sendMessage ⟨j, hDir⟩ __discr.2.1).liftComp (oSpec ++ₒ [pSpec.Challenge]ₒ))
        (Fin.last n) =
    (fun a => (data.fStmtOut (stmtIn, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2).1), data.fWitOut (witIn, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2).2), a.1)) <$>
      Fin.induction (pure (default, P.input (data.fStmtIn stmtIn) (data.fWitIn witIn)))
        (fun j ih => do
          let __discr ← ih
          match hDir : (pSpec j).1 with
            | Direction.V_to_P =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a __discr.1, P.receiveChallenge ⟨j, hDir⟩ __discr.2 a)) <$>
                liftM (query (Sum.inr ⟨j, hDir⟩) ())
            | Direction.P_to_V =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a.1 __discr.1, a.2)) <$>
                (P.sendMessage ⟨j, hDir⟩ __discr.2).liftComp (oSpec ++ₒ [pSpec.Challenge]ₒ))
        (Fin.last n)

      (OptionT.mapM'

    pure (List.map (fun i => eval (D i) p) (List.finRange m))

case succ.refine_3
α : Type
inst✝² : DecidableEq α
inst✝¹ : Inhabited α
inst✝ : Fintype α
n : ℕ
leaves : List.Vector α (2 ^ (n + 1))
i : Fin (2 ^ (n + 1))
ih :
  ∀ (leaves : List.Vector α (2 ^ n)) (i : Fin (2 ^ n)),
    (buildMerkleTree α n leaves).noFailure ∧
      ∀ x ∈ (buildMerkleTree α n leaves).support,
        verifyProof α i (leaves.get i) (x 0).head
            (List.Vector.ofFn fun layer => (x ↑↑layer).get ↑↑(findNeighbors i layer)) =
          pure ()
a b : α
path : List.Vector α (n + 1)
newLeaves : List.Vector α (2 ^ n)
h1 : newLeaves ∈ (buildLayer α n leaves).finSupport
h2 :
  (a, b, path) ∈
    ((fun a =>
          (leaves.get i, (Cache.cons α n leaves a 0).head,
            List.Vector.ofFn fun layer => (Cache.cons α n leaves a ↑↑layer).get ↑↑(findNeighbors i layer))) <$>
        buildMerkleTree α n newLeaves).finSupport
⊢ (if ↑i % 2 = 0 then do
      let newLeaf ← liftM (query () (a, path.get ⟨n, ⋯⟩))
      verifyProof α (↑↑i / 2) newLeaf b (List.Vector.drop 1 path)
    else do
      let newLeaf ← liftM (query () (path.get ⟨n, ⋯⟩, a))
      verifyProof α (↑↑i / 2) newLeaf b (List.Vector.drop 1 path)) =
    pure ()

                liftM (query (Sum.inr ⟨j, hDir⟩) ())
            | Direction.P_to_V =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a.1 __discr.1, a.2, __discr.2.2)) <$>
                (P.sendMessage ⟨j, hDir⟩ __discr.2.1).liftComp (oSpec ++ₒ [pSpec.Challenge]ₒ))
        (Fin.last n) =
    (fun a => (data.fStmtOut (stmtIn, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2).1), data.fWitOut (witIn, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2).2), a.1)) <$>
      Fin.induction (pure (default, P.input (data.fStmtIn stmtIn) (data.fWitIn witIn)))
        (fun j ih => do
          let __discr ← ih
          match hDir : (pSpec j).1 with
            | Direction.V_to_P =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a __discr.1, P.receiveChallenge ⟨j, hDir⟩ __discr.2 a)) <$>
                liftM (query (Sum.inr ⟨j, hDir⟩) ())
            | Direction.P_to_V =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a.1 __discr.1, a.2)) <$>
                (P.sendMessage ⟨j, hDir⟩ __discr.2).liftComp (oSpec ++ₒ [pSpec.Challenge]ₒ))
        (Fin.last n)

      (OptionT.mapM'
